ValidationRule.description: You may not change the status if the opportunity has been submitted to the FSS
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR( BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS 401(k) Sales'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HNBF Sales Rep'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS PEO Centric Sales'), BEGINS($Profile.Name,'HRS PEO-ASO Sales')), OR( $RecordType.Name = 'PEO-ASO Opportunity FSS Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'ASO Opportunity FSS Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'PEO Opportunity FSS Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'HNBF Opportunity DSA Record Type', $RecordType.Name = 'HRS 401(k) Opportunity FSS Record Type'), ISCHANGED(StageName))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You may not change the status if the opportunity has been submitted to the FSS
